Header: THE JAFFNA GANG WHO TERRORIZED THE ENTIRE COUNTRY CAUGHT WITH WEAPONS
Content: Police was able to arrest 5 people belonging to the gang that attacked a shop in Jaffna causing heavy damages using sharp weapons. Police revealed that the suspects have carried out similar attacks in other areas near Jaffna as well. A gang who arrived in 8 motor bikes to a shop in Jaffna – Nallur – Arathadi area attacked a bystander, employee and few people walking on the roadside on January 30. They also went onto set fire to the shop. The assailants fled the place safely. The two persons who received cut injuries are still taking treatment in the Jaffna teaching hospital. Police was able to recover 6 swords, an axe and another sharp weapon when they arrested the suspects at Jaffna – Thausikulam area. The arrested suspects are between the age group of 18 – 37 and they are scheduled to be produced before the Jaffna Magistrate Court. Meanwhile, media personnel questioned State Defence Minister Ruwan Wijewardena about this incident after a ceremony that was held in Gampaha.
